TSX-V: LBL Public company on Toronto Stock Exchange:Lattice Biologics is a leader in the innovative field of cellular therapies and allograft healthcare services, producing allograft products for use in various clinical applications. Known industry wide for their allograft quality, operational efficiency and customer satisfaction, Lattice operates from its state-of-the-art facility in Scottsdale, Arizona.Lattice Biologics‚Äô staff of highly trained tissue bank specialists, surgical technicians, certified sterile processing and distribution technicians and CNC operators maintain the highest standards of aseptic technique throughout each step of the manufacturing process, from donor acceptance to the final packaging and distribution of finished allografts.

Greater Phoenix Economic Council (GPEC) is Arizona's premier economic development organization representing Maricopa County, 23 municipalities, and more than 165 private investors.  GPEC provides companies with confidential, expert support in streamlining site searches, connectivity to decision-makers and access to world-class talent as a complimentary service.My position relates exclusively to Western Canada and building relationships with companies looking to expand into America, as well as government departments, economic development organizations, and trade associations focused on expanding trade and foreign domestic investment between borders.Note:  This contract was completed June 30 after six-month term expired due to unforeseen funding cuts.  If funding is reestablished, I will help advance this effort without question.  It was a fun project with a dynamic, top notch team!

Foundation for Blind Children's mission is to make blindness a diagnosis, not a disability.  Creating learning, safe environments for children to explore and grow into themselves is our passion.  Please join me at Night for Sight, our exclusive annual fundraising dinner that has earned a slot as Ranking Arizona top 20 events.Completed my three year term and continue to fundraise for a great cause.

BDO is the fifth largest network of public accounting firms across the world.  With over $5B in revenue, 1000 offices and 47,000 professionals, our mission is to achieve sustainable professional, cultural, and economic growth as well as meaningful recognition in the marketplace and our profession.  Those who know, know BDO!

She came into the construction industry working for AVR with a background in finance, and very quickly created a positive name recognition and strong brand for AVR, who was not well known prior. Cheryl's enthusiasm for meeting new people, making connections and life in general is contagious. Paired with her strong business and finance background, Cheryl provides a strategic angle to all of her efforts. summary: With 20 years of experience as a former CPA in PA, CO, and AZ, my strong financial background with a deep passion for learning has given me the ability to help grow businesses from lead generation to top line sales.  Exploring various industries has helped me develop a professional skeptism that is universal to any business application, yet unique to the environment.  Constant questioning and critically challenging the status quo are my ways of adding value and saving money for a company.  Results are the only measure of success and if you start with the end in mind, you will save alot of time and wasted energy.  Plan first, then execute!Specialties: Finance, system/process implementation, efficiency management, business development, growth strategy, relationship building, challenging the status quo.
